The Pwani University Christian Union is a body bound by oe faith in God, the unity based on common belief in the LORD JESUS as saviour and living as the Holy Scriptures say. The CU shall be entirely non-political and non-profit. Objectives
 1. Evangelism
 To present JESUS CHRIST as Saviour, LORD and God to students in the University with purpose of leading them to a personal faith in Him.
 2. Discipleship 
 To deepen and strengthen spiritual life of students and equip them for a life time of Service in the family, church and society.
 3. Mission
 To encourage and equip students to take the good news of Christ to every nation on Earth and to be part of the church's witness to the good news, in order to be salt and Light in the World.
 4. Leadership Development
 To develop Christian Leaders who will play key roles while in campus, in church and wider society.



STATEMENT OF FAITH
 1. The unity of the Father, Son and the Holy Spirit in God head.
 2. The Sovereignty of God in Creation, revolution, redemption and final judgement. 
 3. The divined inspiration and entire trustworthiness of Holy Scripture, as originally given and its supreme authority in all matters of faith and conduct.
 4. The universal sinfulness and guilty of all men since the fall, rendering them subject to God's wrath and condemnation.
 5. Redemption from the guilt, penalty, dominion and pollution of solely through the sacrificial death \(Our Representative and substitution\) of the; LORD JESUS from the dead and His ascension to the right hand
But the wisdom that comes from heaven is first of all pure; then peace-loving , considerate, submissive, full of mercy and good fruit, impartial and sincere.
The model of Godly Transformation to Church and society
Do you want to Save Contact or Call Pwani University Christian Union Directly?
Save the contact First to text Pwani Pwani University Christian Union in WhatsApp.
Thank you Lord God Almighty. Amen.
